name: Aster (itch)
description:
Aster sets off to collect the beautiful star flowers from the sky, using her astral projection and constellation manipulation, will she deliver them before day break?

A/S/D to move

SPACE to jump (and advance dialogue)

P to pause

SHIFT to enter Constellation Mode

LEFT MOUSE to move Constellations

E to return a star

(there's a known bug that sometimes clicking a constellation won't move it, just hit shift and it should reset it, although you may have to do it a few times)
